Articles.Content: So several years ago I was in a relationship with someone. The relationship ended badly and we haven't spoken to each other in years. Before that I had purchased a large Toothless stuffed animal (you know from How to Train your Dragon). It was amazing. It was almost 50 inches long and had this amazing wingspan. It was also cuddly and wonderful. Since it was a gift to her from me obviously she kept it. I purchased it on Etsy and now the person who made it is no longer active and her store has disappeared into the Etsy nether. I know it's stupid to feel sad about this, but it's been really bothering me something fierce. I'm not even sure why I'm mentioning this, but I think I just needed to vent it because I'm tired of bottling it up and quietly weeping about it before I go to sleep.
There is but one hope: plushie Kerbals!
I dunno. That toothless stuffed animal was lovely to use as a pillow and it always made me pretty darn happy. Not saying a Kerbal plushie wouldn't. Just saying I miss toothless.
Do you have pictures of it? Maybe you could find somebody to make another one for you.

Do you have pictures of it? Maybe you could find somebody to make another one for you.

I think you should strive not to make a replica, but something similar yet with its own personality. That way you do not get stuck in the past, but can still enjoy it like you did before.
Forget a Kerbal, what about a walrus?
Yea, there is always that one awesome epic stuffed thing that nothing else can replace. Always sad to lose it

Forget a Kerbal, what about a walrus?

A glorious plushie walrus to ride into battle?

A glorious plushie walrus to ride into battle?

You can be my eggman and I can be your long lost walrus!

No wait, that's not right...
I don't know what to say, i've never had a stuffed animal. I was always too busy creating nations, waging wars, and basically competing with my brothers in a large sandbox.

I... I have this... this little pony I... I stole from my little sister.

Now I take it when I travel and always sleep with it.

I know how that feels. Maybe if you post a picture of it somebody can make another one like it.
